title: Goldman Sachs Promotes 643 Managing Directors, Its Largest Class Ever
sub_head: Bank says bigger class reflects investments in its asset-management and consumer arms
body:
Goldman Sachs Group Inc. on Tuesday named its largest-ever class of managing directors, the final role before a coveted partnership.
The Wall Street bank promoted 643 employees to managing directors, a 38% increase from the previous selection in 2019. New classes of managing directors and partners are chosen in alternating years.
